title: Joey runs away (K)
creator_credit: Paul R. Gagne, Weston Woods Studios and Daniel Ivanick
brief_description: Joey, a young kangaroo, tired of his mother’s complaints about his messy room in her pouch, decides to run away. While Joey searches for a new home, word gets around that his mother has an empty room. What follows will entertain children of all ages. Based on the book by Jack Kent.
